main_subtitle: Holding a Pass allows you to join our exclusive investor club and participate in future decision-making. It also comes with many financial benefits.
industry_system: Only Pass holders can vote for the upcoming films to be financed
industry_app: 1 Pass = 1 Investment Ticket More passes = more tickets per movie
industry_funding: Get rewarded in NRT Tokens by participating in the voting process
industry_redistributed: Exclusive event invitations for Narativ's loyal members
